name: President Bush
description:
AWSD= PLAY AROUND

SPACE= COW LURE

CTRL= PRESS IT ON PRESIDENT TO SAVE HIM FROM THE LASER

INTERACT WITH BARN DOOR =E

USE INTERACTION WHEN COW INSIDE OF THE BARN. LURE IT INSIDE AND LEAVE AND CLOSE THE DOOR BEHIND.

AWSD= OYNA

SPACE= Kendinden parca koparim inegi ona gonder

genel olarak inekten kurtulma= Ahirin icine sok cali birak orda onu yerken disari cikip E ile kapiyi kapa.

Ctrl= President sniperla vurulucakken uzerine oturup saklama
